notes: Recently renovated apartment with modern minimalist design featuring track lighting, gray accent walls, and contemporary fixtures. The kitchen is fully equipped with gas stove, range hood, and full-size refrigerator. Two bedrooms are visible but small with single beds. For baby safety: no visible balcony access concerns, flat flooring throughout with no stairs, and rounded/minimal furniture. The bathroom has a wet room style shower which may need a mat for slip prevention. Good natural light from large windows in living area. Overall clean and well-maintained.
